title: Using tech to enable dreaming
description: Has our technology -- our cell phones and iPods and cameras -- stopped us from dreaming? Young artist Shilo Shiv Suleman says no, as she demos "Khoya," her new storybook for iPad, which floats us through a magical world in 7 minutes of pure creativity.
author: Shilo Shiv Suleman
keywords: TED, talks, art, creativity, Best of the Web
